channel.title: CVE Feed for Telstra -- Smart Modem Gen 2 (Arcadyan LH1000)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Telstra -- Smart Modem Gen 2 (Arcadyan LH1000)

item.title: CVE-2023-43477|2023-09-20T12:41:03.578Z -- telstra -- smart%20modem%20gen%202%20%28arcadyan%20lh1000%29
item.description: The ping_from parameter of ping_tracerte.cgi in the web UI of Telstra Smart Modem Gen 2 (Arcadyan LH1000), firmware versions < 0.18.15r, was not properly sanitized before being used in a system call, which could allow an authenticated attacker to achieve command injection as root on the device.Â
